name: Dirty Business
description: Dirty Business is a top-down game where the player will run through various businesses and collect money while avoiding being caught by enemies. However, when collecting Blue Money, the game will pause. While paused, the player must finish a mini-game before being caught by an enemy. Dirty Business was created for Mini Jam 60: Crime. This game was created by Developers Kolton Kovac, Brian Conn and Designer Joe Nash.
